perturbation.original_text: 8.1 Monthly Fees. Beginning on the Effective Date, you will pay to us for each month (or part of a month, including the final month you operate under this Agreement) the Monthly Fees, each of which is set forth in the Addendum.
perturbation.changed_text: 8.1 Monthly Fees. Beginning on the Effective Date, you will pay to us for each month (or part of a month, including the final month you operate under this Agreement) the Monthly Fees.
perturbation.explanation: The definition of 'Monthly Fees' in the Addendum section is now referenced, but the specific amounts are removed. This will cause a contradiction as the obligation to pay exists without a clear method for determination.

perturbation.original_text: 5.1.6 purchase and maintain property management, revenue management, in-room entertainment, telecommunications, high-speed Internet access, and other computer and technology systems that we designate for the System or any portion of the System based on our assessment of the long-term best interests of System Hotels, considering the interest of the System as a whole;
perturbation.changed_text: 5.1.6 purchase and maintain property management, revenue management, in-room entertainment, telecommunications, high-speed Internet access, and other computer and technology systems for the System or any portion of the System, considering the interest of the System as a whole;
perturbation.explanation: By removing 'that we designate' and 'based on our assessment of the long-term best interests of System Hotels', the clause now implies the franchisee has full control over which systems to purchase, contradicting the definition of System which grants the franchisor rights.

perturbation.original_text: 4.5 Inspections/Compliance Assistance. We will administer a quality assurance program for the System that may include conducting pre- opening and periodic inspections of the Hotel and guest satisfaction surveys and audits to ensure compliance with the Standards. You will permit us to inspect the Hotel without prior notice to you to determine if the Hotel is in compliance with the Standards. You will cooperate with our representatives during these inspections. You will then take all steps necessary to correct any deficiencies within the times we establish. You may be charged a Quality Assurance Re-Evaluation Fee as set forth in the Standards. You will provide complimentary accommodations for the quality assurance auditor each time we conduct a regular inspection or a special on-site quality assurance re-evaluation after the Hotel has failed a regular quality assurance evaluation or to verify that deficiencies noted in a quality assurance evaluation report or PIP have been corrected or completed by the required dates.
perturbation.changed_text: 4.5 Inspections/Compliance Assistance. You will cooperate with our representatives during these inspections. You will then take all steps necessary to correct any deficiencies.
perturbation.explanation: By removing the line 'You will permit us to inspect the Hotel without prior notice to you to determine if the Hotel is in compliance with the Standards' and 'You may be charged a Quality Assurance Re-Evaluation Fee as set forth in the Standards', and 'You will provide complimentary accommodations for the quality assurance auditor each time we conduct a regular inspection or a special on-site quality assurance re-evaluation after the Hotel has failed a regular quality assurance evaluation or to verify that deficiencies noted in a quality assurance evaluation report or PIP have been corrected or completed by the required dates.', it is no longer defined what happens when the Hotel isn't in compliance or about the re-evaluation, but it is still noted about having inspections in the beginning of this section, which leads to a contradiction.
